about_the_game:
Introducing the Invasive Species Free Content Update!

This update includes...

  • 🐛New Boss: Unfriendly Worm
  • 🛸New Boss: U.F.B.
  • 🍄New Boss: The Spore You Know
  • 🕷️New Boss: Itsy Bitsy
  • 🌑Rare Blood Moon nights with new enemies.
  • 👽New Alien Ant featuring additional permanent upgrades.
  • 🌳Topiaries - Unlock achievements to gain topiaries on your farmhouse. Topiaries provide permanent bonuses
  • 📜New Scroll: Blood Spell: Fertilize all crops and all nearby enemies bleed fertilizer.
  • 📜New Scroll: Cataclysm: Cut hundreds of weeds, damage all enemies, expand farmable land and till soil.
  • 📜New Scroll: Anemochory Aurora: Plant top tier seeds across your farm.
  • 💯11 New Achievements to put your skills to the test.
detailed_description:
Introducing the Invasive Species Free Content Update!

This update includes...

  • 🐛New Boss: Unfriendly Worm
  • 🛸New Boss: U.F.B.
  • 🍄New Boss: The Spore You Know
  • 🕷️New Boss: Itsy Bitsy
  • 🌑Rare Blood Moon nights with new enemies.
  • 👽New Alien Ant featuring additional permanent upgrades.
  • 🌳Topiaries - Unlock achievements to gain topiaries on your farmhouse. Topiaries provide permanent bonuses
  • 📜New Scroll: Blood Spell: Fertilize all crops and all nearby enemies bleed fertilizer.
  • 📜New Scroll: Cataclysm: Cut hundreds of weeds, damage all enemies, expand farmable land and till soil.
  • 📜New Scroll: Anemochory Aurora: Plant top tier seeds across your farm.
  • 💯11 New Achievements to put your skills to the test.

name: Atomicrops: Invasive Species

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 5350, Intel Core i3-2100T or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480M, Radeon HD 6790 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 605e, Intel Celeron G1610 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7850, GeForce GTX 470 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: The Invasive Species Free Update features new bosses, scrolls, achievements, permanent upgrades and more!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
